summary: The module provides a sample Feast feature repository tailored for AWS deployments, demonstrating the definition of entities, various data sources (Redshift, push, request), feature views, onâ€‘demand feature views, and feature services, along with simple helper functions for feature transformations.
business_intent: To serve as a reference template that helps data engineers quickly set up and configure Feast feature stores on AWS, enabling consistent feature engineering and serving for machine learning models.
